title: Opinionated Feature Module Options Schema
description: Creates a new opinionated feature module in the given or default project.

projectName.x-prompt: What project should the module be generated in? (Leave blank to use the default project)

path.description: The path at which to create the feature module files, relative to the project root
path.x-prompt: What path should the module be generated at?

name.description: The name of the feature module.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the feature module?
